snippet: Ten years after a couple from New Mexico arrived in New York City and became ill with the plague, many aspects of the case still puzzle experts.
abstract: Case of bubonic plague that sickened Lucinda Marker and John Tull while on a 2002 trip to New York City remains mysterious ten years later; doctors have been unable to determine why Marker was completely cured while Tull nearly died.
lead_paragraph: Ten years after a couple from New Mexico arrived in New York City and became ill with the plague, many aspects of the case still puzzle experts.

headline.seo: Reliving the Nightmare of Plague, 10 Years Later
headline.main: Reliving Nightmare of Plague, 10 Years On
headline.print_headline: Reliving Nightmare Of Plague, 10 Years On
